item.title: Mini Package: hdxr
item.description: Mini package - Mini post I realised that when I wrote this post, I should do something more sensible to share the code then put the text up in a blog. Writing a package seemed overkill though, and something you only do for ‘real code’. But curiousity got the better of me, and after reading the go-to post for package writing, I thought I might as well try. So here we are: hdxr
